# AnimationLibraryComponent.AnimationCollection.Iterator

**Structure**

An object to iterate over all animations in the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Iterator
```

## Iterating over animations

- **makeIterator()**: Returns an iterator over the animations in the collection.

## Conforms To

- IteratorProtocol

items.description: Returns an iterator over the animations in the collection.
items.name: makeIterator()
